form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN, FORM I-250 ( (REV. 6-1-69)

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FORM APPROVED IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE BUDGET BUREAU NO. 43-ROS on APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF FEE STAMP UI PERMANENT RESIDENCE Bills F AN ALIEN RECEIVED Take or mail to- 29 Way 1970 DEPARTMENT IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, of the United States of Ameries I request that the American Consul at Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico Master be furnished a verification of my lawful admission into the United States for permanent residence to be used in connection with the person(s) listed under item 15. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS: QUINTANA Romualdo FOIA (b)( (6) 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 4. MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) 110 Concord Street - Los Angeles; California 90063 December 26, 1938 5. FATHER'S NAME: 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS: (City) (Country) JUAN QUINTANA Tepehuanes, Durango, Mexico 7. MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME: 8. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) BALTAZAR DIAZ / Mexico INFORMATION IN THESE BLOCKS PERTAINS TO MY LAST ARRIVAL INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE 9. MEANS OF ARRIVAL: (Name of Vessel, or Airline and Flight No, etc.) 08/21/56 Afoot 13. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSONIN THE U.S. TO WHOM IWAS DESTINED: 14.
